text: "Living Dead Girl" is a 1999 song by Rob Zombie and is the second single from his debut studio album Hillbilly Deluxe. It also appears on his greatest hits album Past, Present & Future. It went to number 7 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks chart and was used in the 1998 movie Bride of Chucky. ==References== Category:1999 songs Category:Rob Zombie songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Living Dead Girl (song)
